commitment.title: GPFH Commitment to Sustainability
commitment.text: In recent years, building homes with environmentally-friendly materials and practices has become increasingly important to our community and planet. We endeavor to minimize our environmental footprint in our business and with your custom home. For any client hoping to pursue a custom home using sustainable construction practices, we offer several options for you so that your home can be as “green” and environmentally-friendly as you desire.

nhba.text: Grove Park Fine Homes is an NHBA Certified Green Professional.
